name: Adaptor
description: Converter for net/http handlers to/from Fiber request handlers.

name: BasicAuth
description: Basic auth middleware provides an HTTP basic authentication. It calls the next handler for valid credentials and 401 Unauthorized for missing or invalid credentials.

name: Cache
description: Intercept and cache responses.

name: Compress
description: Compression middleware for Fiber, it supports deflate, gzip and brotli by default.

name: CORS
description: Enable cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) with various options.

name: CSRF
description: Protect from CSRF exploits.

name: Earlydata
description: Early data support for Fiber.

name: Encrypt Cookie
description: Encrypt middleware which encrypts cookie values.

name: EnvVar
description: Expose environment variables with providing an optional config.

name: ETag
description: ETag middleware that lets caches be more efficient and save bandwidth, as a web server does not need to resend a full response if the content has not changed.

name: Expvar
description: Expvar middleware that serves via its HTTP server runtime exposed variants in the JSON format.

name: Favicon
description: Ignore favicon from logs or serve from memory if a file path is provided.

name: FileSystem
description: FileSystem middleware for Fiber, special thanks and credits to Alireza Salary.

name: Helmet
description: Helps secure your apps by setting various HTTP headers.

name: Idempotency
description: Idempotency middleware for Fiber allows for fault-tolerant APIs where duplicate requests.

name: Keyauth
description: Key auth middleware provides a key based authentication.

name: Limiter
description: Rate-limiting middleware. Use to limit repeated requests to public APIs and/or endpoints such as password reset.

name: Logger
description: HTTP request/response logger.

name: Monitor
description: Monitor middleware that reports server metrics, inspired by express-status-monitor.

name: Pprof
description: Pprof middleware that serves via its HTTP server runtime profiling data in the format expected by the pprof visualization tool.

name: Proxy
description: Allows you to proxy requests to a multiple servers.

name: Recover
description: Recover middleware recovers from panics anywhere in the stack chain and handles the control to the centralized ErrorHandler.

name: Redirect
description: Redirect middleware for Fiber.

name: RequestID
description: Adds a requestid to every request.

name: Rewrite
description: Rewrite middleware rewrites the URL path based on provided rules. It can be helpful for backward compatibility or just creating cleaner and more descriptive links.

name: Session
description: Session middleware. NOTE: This middleware uses our Storage package.

name: Skip
description: Skip middleware that skips a wrapped handler is a predicate is true.

name: Timeout
description: Adds a max time for a request and forwards to ErrorHandler if it is exceeded.

name: storage
description: Premade storage drivers that implement the Storage interface, designed to be used with various Fiber middlewares.

name: template
description: This package contains 8 template engines that can be used with Fiber v1.10.x Go version 1.13 or higher is required.

name: casbin
description: Casbin middleware for Fiber.

name: fiberi18n
description: Middleware for i18n support in Fiber.

name: fibernewrelic
description: NewRelic middleware for Fiber. The middleware handles NewRelic insturmentation.

name: fibersentry
description: Sentry support for Fiber.

name: fiberzap
description: Zap logging support for Fiber.

name: jwt
description: JWT returns a JSON Web Token (JWT) auth middleware.

name: opafiber
description: Open Policy Agent middleware for Fiber. The middleware handles running Rego policies.

name: otelfiber
description: OpenTelemetry support for Fiber.

name: paseto
description: PASETO returns a Web Token (PASETO) auth middleware.

name: swagger
description: Swagger middleware for Fiber. The middleware handles Swagger UI.

name: websocket
description: Based on Fasthttp WebSocket for Fiber with Locals support!

name: shareed2k/fiber_tracing
description: Middleware trace requests on Fiber framework with OpenTracing API.

name: shareed2k/fiber_limiter
description: Limiter using redis as store for rate limit with two algorithms for choosing sliding window, gcra leaky bucket.

name: ansrivas/fiberprometheus
description: Prometheus middleware for gofiber.

name: sacsand/gofiber-firebaseauth
description: Fiber Firebase Auth Middleware.

name: aschenmaker/fiber-health-check
description: Health-check middleware support health-check for FiberÔ∏è framework.

name: elastic/apmfiber
description: APM Agent for Go Fiber.

name: eozer/fiber_ldapauth
description: LDAP Authentication Middleware for Fiber.

name: darkweak/souin
description: HTTP cache, RFC compliant, alternative to Varnish available as a middleware.

name: witer33/fiberpow
description: Anti DDoS/Bot Middleware with a customizable Proof Of Work challenge.

name: joffref/opa-middleware
description: Provides an OPA middleware integration for fiber.

name: vladfr/fiber-servertiming
description: A middleware to add Server-Timing headers based on the W3C Server-Timing Spec.

name: airbrake/gobrake
description: An Airbrake middleware that reports performance data (route stats).

name: samber/slog-fiber
description: A logger middleware that uses Go slog library.

name: mikhail-bigun/fiberlogrus
description: A logger middleware that uses logrus and its structured logging features.

name: Idan-Fishman/fiber-bind
description: Request schema validator middleware that validates sources such as the request body, query string parameters, route parameters and even form files.

name: gofiber/boilerplate
description: Official fiber boilerplate.

name: fiber-boilerplate
description: A boilerplate for the Fiber web framework.

description: Boilerplate on the top of fiber web framework with many middlewares and features.

name: sujit-baniya/goravel
description: Laravel similar boilerplate go Go with support for Gofiber or Gin.

name: create-go-app/fiber-go-template
description: Fiber backend template for Create Go App CLI.

name: efectn/fiber-boilerplate
description: Simple and scalable boilerplate to build powerful and organized REST projects with Fiber.

name: embedmode/fiberseed
description: Fiber boilerplate api with many middlewares.

description: Clean architecture Go application boilerplate with enriched Fiber implementation.

description: Fiber quick start example project.

description: Golang Authentication API with Fiber MongoDB and JWT.

name: alpody/golang-fiber-realworld-example-app
description: Example real world backend API built with Fiber, Gorm, Swagger.

name: go-dawn/dawn
description: Dawn is an opinionated web framework that provides rapid development capabilities which on top of Fiber.

name: tompston/gomakeme
description: Generate boilerplate + endpoints for Fiber or Gin REST APIs.

description: Feserve is a lightweight application or docker image to serve frontend and load balancer applications.

description: Generate Go client and server boilerplate from OpenAPI 3 specifications.
